title: AMERICAN HORROR STORY Crossover (Trailer)
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: I swear, you're the best of youtube
i want madison in it even though she's dead
AMAZING! I think Sarah Paulson's character will play a very important role.....!

The character that lady gaga played in Roanoke is actually the first ever supreme witch. So I would guess that you'd see quite a bit about her backstory in the coven and murder house cross over season
I admit it sounds interesting but to be honest I'm a little bit on the fence about it
description:
Now that American Horror Story has been renewed for three more seasons, the question is what they plan to do with them. We know that one of the ideas involves a crossover season that will mash up Murder House and Coven (seasons 1 and 3, respectively).
The American Horror Story crossover season is happening, and Ryan Murphy has the details.
